name: 彼岸/ghostdom/冥界/彼岸です/ghost Lora
description:
大家好，我是chosen鲷，这次带来的是彼岸lora模型。

本模型使用的是一些mj生成的图片作为训练集，目的是为了训练出一个能够稳定跑出如例图氛围的模型，这个lora局限性较大，基本就是用来出这种仰视角的竖版图，如果写其他的tag那么他的效果就不太明显了，图片尺寸建议512*768，采样方式dpm++SDE karras，步数32，cfg 7，记得高清重绘，重绘方式建议RE-ESRGAN 4X，重绘幅度0.5，我例图的tag基本格式就是

(masterpiece:1.2), best quality,realistic,Tyndall effect,

中间写你想要出的内容

<lora:ghostdom_20230621222536-000016:1>

Negative prompt: EasyNegative, badhandsv5-neg,

建议使用我的chosen mix或者星辰大模型，其他的常见的像ghost meina啥的也行，vae搭配8400即可。例图是能够读取tag的，大家可以尝试一下。

感谢大家的下载使用，如果喜欢的话欢迎关注我，我的bilibili pixiv ID均为chosen鲷，欢迎大家关注我的频道https://space.bilibili.com/3867754?spm_id_from=333.1007.0.0

https://www.pixiv.net/users/40911695 谢谢。

Hello, I'm chosen 鲷, and this time I'm here with the Other Shore lora model.

This model uses some mj generated pictures as a training set, the purpose is to train a model that can stably run out of the atmosphere of the example picture. This lora has major limitations, and it is basically used to create a vertical layout with such a high Angle of view. If other tags are written, the effect is not obvious. Sampling method dpm++SDE karras, step number 32, cfg 7, remember HD redrawing, redrawing method is recommended RE-ESRGAN 4X, redrawing amplitude 0.5, the basic tag format of my example diagram is

(masterpiece: 1.2), best quality, realistic, Tyndall effect.

Write what you want to write in the middle

<lora:ghostdom_20230621222536-000016:1>

Negative prompt: EasyNegative, badhandsv5-neg,

It is recommended to use my chosen mix or star model, other common ones like ghost meina will also work, vae with 8400. Example diagram is able to read tag, you can try it.

, thank you very much for downloading use, if you like welcome to pay attention to my, my bilibili pixiv ID are feature bream, https://space.bilibili.com/3867754?spm_id_from=333.1007.0.0 welcome to pay attention to my channel

https://www.pixiv.net/users/40911695, thank you.
